active_learning.discussion_prompt: In what scenarios should certification identification numbers (CINs) be publicly displayed versus kept private? Debate the balance between transparency for stakeholders (e.g., proving qualifications) and risks to security or misuse (e.g., impersonation or phishing). Reference (ISC)² Code of Ethics.
